rows.label: Plan Price (per month)
rows.description: The monthly cost of your subscription plan.

rows.label: Agents Included
rows.description: Number of agent licenses included in your plan at no extra cost.

rows.label: Additional Agents (per month)
rows.description: Add more seats to your plan and scale your team as needed.

rows.label: Customer Profiles
rows.description: Maximum number of unique customer profiles you can manage in your workspace.

rows.label: AI Usage
rows.description: Number of AI-powered actions (like summaries or replies) available per day.

rows.label: Billable Conversations Limit
rows.description: Monthly limit for human-handled conversations (if applicable).

rows.label: Free Trial
rows.description: Length and conditions of the free trial (e.g., days, credit card required or not).

rows.label: Chats Package
rows.description: Number of chats included into the plan.

rows.label: Paid Chats
rows.description: Chats beyond the free plan.

rows.label: Alternative Payment Methods
rows.description: Pay via purchase orders or annual invoices instead of a company card.

rows.label: Pay With Crypto
rows.description: Pay with crypto like USDC on Ethereum, Solana, or Polygon.

rows.label: Monthly Subscription (per agent/month)
rows.description: The monthly cost charged for each agent seat on the selected plan.

rows.label: Annual Subscription (per agent/month)
rows.description: The equivalent monthly cost per agent when billed annually, usually offered at a discounted rate.

rows.label: Seats
rows.description: Number of agent seats included in the plan by default. May be 'Custom' for flexible or negotiated plans.

rows.label: Per agent/month billed annually
rows.description: Price per agent when billed annually.

rows.label: Per agent/month billed monthly
rows.description: Price per agent when billed monthly.

rows.label: Essential plan
rows.description: Represents the core subscription tier offering essential features for standard use.

rows.label: Advanced plan
rows.description: Indicates availability of the advanced subscription tier or add-on option.

rows.label: Active chatbots
rows.description: Maximum number of chatbots that can be active at the same time.

rows.label: Cloud-based
rows.description: Your workspace data and conversations are securely hosted in the cloud, always accessible and backed up.

rows.label: Mobile Apps
rows.description: Access everything related to your customer service from your phone.

rows.label: Desktop Apps
rows.description: Use native apps on Windows and Mac for a seamless desktop experience.

rows.label: Real-time Notifications
rows.description: Receive alerts to stay up to date with open conversations.

rows.label: Developer APIs
rows.description: Access APIs to build custom integrations and automate workflows.

rows.label: Live Geolocation Map
rows.description: See all active website visitors in real time and start conversations.

rows.label: Conversation Transcript
rows.description: Easily export or view the full transcript of customer conversations.

rows.label: Conversation Triage
rows.description: Automatically sort and organize incoming conversations for efficient handling.

rows.label: Working Hours Settings
rows.description: Define business hours to set expectations and automate responses outside those times.

rows.label: Unlimited Conversations
rows.description: Handle as many customer conversations as you need, with no limits.

rows.label: Custom Email Domain
rows.description: Set up a custom domain to send outbound emails and improve deliverability.

rows.label: Full Conversations' history
rows.description: Access the full history of customer conversations for context and insights.

rows.label: Internal Notes
rows.description: Make internal collaboration easy, centralized, and tailored for each conversation.

rows.label: Visitor Banning
rows.description: Block users who exhibit inappropriate or abusive behavior on any channel.

rows.label: File Sharing
rows.description: Send and receive attachments directly within conversations.

rows.label: Canned Responses
rows.description: Create, manage, and use a gallery of prewritten messages to improve efficiency.

rows.label: Conversation Ratings
rows.description: Send automated surveys to measure customer satisfaction (CSAT).

rows.label: Follow-up Reminders
rows.description: Schedule predefined or custom reminders on each conversation with detailed notes.

rows.label: Round-robin Routing
rows.description: Assign conversations automatically to available agents in a fair, rotating manner.

rows.label: Internal Agent Chat
rows.description: Agents can chat internally without leaving the dashboard.

rows.label: Universal Inbox
rows.description: Centralized inbox to handle conversations from all channels.

rows.label: Hybrid Ticket Stream
rows.description: Single thread follows a customer across channels.

rows.label: Tags
rows.description: Tag conversations for search and reporting.

rows.label: Team Collaboration
rows.description: Invite your teammates and build chatbots together.

rows.label: All chats
rows.description: Total chats in a period.

rows.label: All messages
rows.description: Total messages received by your chatbot.

rows.label: Visitor notes
rows.description: Allows agents to add internal notes about a visitor or conversation for future reference.

rows.label: Unified agent workspace
rows.description: Provides a consolidated workspace where agents can manage all customer interactions.

rows.label: Custom & group views
rows.description: Enables creating personalized and group-based views for organizing work.

rows.label: Custom agent statuses
rows.description: Indicates whether custom agent availability statuses can be created and managed.

rows.label: Dynamic, Contextual workspaces
rows.description: Automatically adjusts the agent workspace based on the context of the ticket or interaction.

rows.label: Side conversations
rows.description: Allows agents to create and manage side conversations within a ticket to collaborate with other teams or partners.

rows.label: Unified staff management
rows.description: Provides unified tools for managing staff roles, permissions, and workloads.

rows.label: Department spaces
rows.description: Provides separate spaces for organizing work by department.

rows.label: Ticketing
rows.description: System for managing customer support requests as tickets.

rows.label: Chat page
rows.description: Provides a dedicated page for handling and viewing live chat conversations.

rows.label: Ticket history
rows.description: Store and access all past tickets, conversations, and call records.

rows.label: Merge tickets
rows.description: Merge multiple tickets into one to avoid duplicates and keep full context.

rows.label: Split tickets
rows.description: Split a ticket into separate tickets when multiple issues are reported in one conversation.

rows.label: Internal tickets
rows.description: Create internal-only tickets for internal requests, handoffs, or internal tasks.

rows.label: Attachments
rows.description: Allow adding and viewing file attachments inside tickets.

rows.label: Agent notes to tickets
rows.description: Allow agents to add internal notes to tickets (not visible to customers).

rows.label: Multiple ticket tabs
rows.description: Work with multiple tickets at the same time using tabs.

rows.label: Custom ticket fields
rows.description: Create custom fields to capture structured information in tickets.

rows.label: Ticket satisfaction survey
rows.description: Collect satisfaction feedback (CSAT) for resolved tickets.

rows.label: Contacts & Groups
rows.description: Manage contacts and organize them into groups for routing, visibility, or segmentation.

rows.label: Customer mail templates
rows.description: Use templates for customer emails (replies, notifications, and ticket updates).

rows.label: Chat widget
rows.description: Engage with people browsing your website and get closer to your customers.

rows.label: Contact Form
rows.description: Centralize submissions from customizable contact forms within the shared inbox.

rows.label: Email
rows.description: Receive and reply to team emails directly from the shared inbox.

rows.label: Telegram
rows.description: Receive and reply to Telegram messages from the shared inbox.

rows.label: Messenger
rows.description: Receive and reply to Facebook Messenger messages from the shared inbox.

rows.label: X (Twitter)
rows.description: Receive and reply to Twitter/X DMs from the shared inbox.

rows.label: Instagram
rows.description: Reply to Instagram Direct Messages and story replies from the dashboard.

rows.label: SMS
rows.description: Receive and reply to SMS messages in the shared inbox.

rows.label: Viber
rows.description: Receive and reply to Viber messages in the shared inbox.

rows.label: Phone
rows.description: Answer phone calls and trigger outbound calls directly from the platform.

rows.label: Line
rows.description: Receive and reply to Line messages in the shared inbox.

rows.label: WhatsApp Business
rows.description: Receive and reply to WhatsApp Business messages in the shared inbox.

rows.label: Active chatbots
rows.description: Maximum number of chatbots you can have active at the same time under this plan.

rows.label: Webflow
rows.description: Add ChatBot to your Webflow site.

rows.label: BigCommerce
rows.description: Connect your ChatBot to BigCommerce.

rows.label: Live Chat
rows.description: Enables real-time text conversations between website visitors and support agents through an embedded chat window.

rows.label: Live Video Calls
rows.description: Supports direct video communication between agents and customers for instant, face-to-face interaction.

rows.label: App integrations
rows.description: Supports integration with third-party apps to extend platform functionality and workflows.

rows.label: Support over email
rows.description: Provides customer support via email communication.

rows.label: Support over live chat
rows.description: Provides customer support through real-time live chat assistance.

rows.label: Email ticketing – Incoming email accounts
rows.description: Number of incoming email addresses that can be connected for ticket creation.

rows.label: Email ticketing – Outgoing email accounts
rows.description: Number of outgoing email accounts that can be used to send replies from the system.

rows.label: Call center
rows.description: Includes built-in call center functionality for handling voice calls.

rows.label: Messenger + Instagram
rows.description: Supports Instagram messaging when the Messenger channel is connected.

rows.label: WhatsApp
rows.description: Supports WhatsApp as a communication channel.

rows.label: Video call functionality
rows.description: Allows conducting real-time video calls with customers.

rows.label: Call Queueing
rows.description: Places callers in a waiting queue when all agents are busy.

rows.label: IVR
rows.description: Interactive voice response menu for routing callers through predefined options.

rows.label: In call recordings
rows.description: Allows recording phone calls for review or quality assurance.

rows.label: Call routing & transfers
rows.description: Allows redirecting and transferring calls between agents or departments.

rows.label: Hardware IP phone
rows.description: Allows using physical IP phones integrated with the call center system.

rows.label: Email with unlimited addresses
rows.description: Provides unlimited email addresses for handling incoming and outgoing messages.

rows.label: Contact form
rows.description: Enables a built-in contact form for collecting customer inquiries.

rows.label: Social and business channels
rows.description: Provides support for connecting social media and business communication channels.

rows.label: Voicemail
rows.description: Allows callers to leave voice messages when agents are unavailable.

rows.label: Text messages
rows.description: Provides SMS messaging capabilities; available as an add-on.

rows.label: Embedded voice
rows.description: Allows voice calling directly through the embedded voice channel.

rows.label: Display a number using web widget
rows.description: Displays a phone number inside the web widget for quick access.

rows.label: Partner Edition (Computer Telephony Integration)
rows.description: Enables CTI features for integrating phone systems with the platform.

rows.label: Answer in browser & forward to phone
rows.description: Allows answering calls directly in the browser and forwarding them to a phone.

rows.label: Outbound Caller ID
rows.description: Allows setting a caller ID for outbound calls, including using an external number when available.

rows.label: Call routing
rows.description: Supports advanced routing options such as group routing, overflow routing, and after-hours routing.

rows.label: Failover
rows.description: Provides failover capabilities; may be available on demand depending on the plan.

rows.label: Customized greetings
rows.description: Allows setting personalized greetings for incoming calls or messages.

rows.label: Queue size and wait time
rows.description: Displays queue size and estimated wait times; may be available on demand depending on the plan.

rows.label: Session Initiation Protocol (SIP)
rows.description: Enables SIP-based calling and integration with external phone systems.

rows.label: Bring Your Own Carrier (BYOC)
rows.description: Allows using your own telephony carrier for handling calls.

rows.label: Automatic ticket creation
rows.description: Creates support tickets automatically when new interactions are received.

rows.label: Call recording
rows.description: Enables recording of calls for quality assurance or review.

rows.label: Mute, hold & warm transfer
rows.description: Provides mute, hold, and warm transfer options during live calls.

rows.label: Conference calling
rows.description: Enables multiple participants to join the same call simultaneously.

rows.label: Call blocking
rows.description: Allows blocking unwanted or restricted phone numbers.

rows.label: Interactive voice response (IVR, phone trees)
rows.description: Provides automated phone menus that route callers based on their selections.

rows.label: Priority numbers
rows.description: Allows assigning priority handling to selected phone numbers.

rows.label: Request a callback
rows.description: Lets callers request a callback instead of waiting on hold.

rows.label: Call wrap-up time limits
rows.description: Defines post-call wrap-up time rules for agents.

rows.label: Call recording controls
rows.description: Provides options to manage and control call recording settings.

rows.label: Call monitoring & barging
rows.description: Allows supervisors to monitor live calls and join when needed.

rows.label: Call quality notifications
rows.description: Alerts agents or admins when call quality issues are detected.

rows.label: Call offering time limit
rows.description: Allows setting a time limit for how long a call is offered to an agent.

rows.label: Call usage 99.95% uptime SLA
rows.description: Specifies the guaranteed uptime SLA for call usage, such as 99.95%.

rows.label: Local and toll-free numbers
rows.description: Supports using local or toll-free phone numbers for inbound and outbound calling.

rows.label: Inbound and outbound minutes
rows.description: Indicates the number of included inbound and outbound call minutes in the plan.

rows.label: Contact Center
rows.description: Provides access to contact center capabilities; available as an add-on.

rows.label: Twitter
rows.description: Support customers via Twitter/X messages.

rows.label: WordPress
rows.description: Easily install the chat widget on your WordPress site.

rows.label: Shopify
rows.description: Sync e-commerce data with your inbox to enable dedicated features.

rows.label: WooCommerce
rows.description: Sync WooCommerce orders and customer data for better support.

rows.label: Adobe Commerce
rows.description: Integrate with Adobe Commerce to centralize customer communications.

rows.label: Prestashop
rows.description: Integrate with Prestashop to sync orders and customer data.

rows.label: Slack
rows.description: Reply to incoming messages directly from your Slack workspace.

rows.label: HubSpot
rows.description: Synchronize with your HubSpot account.

rows.label: Pipedrive
rows.description: Synchronize with your Pipedrive account.

rows.label: Zoho CRM
rows.description: Synchronize with your Zoho account.

rows.label: Segment
rows.description: Connect as a source and collect customer data from hundreds of platforms.

rows.label: Zapier
rows.description: Connect with over 8,000 apps — no coding required.

rows.label: Make
rows.description: Automate workflows by connecting to other apps with Make.

rows.label: n8n
rows.description: Integrate with no-code/low-code automation workflows using n8n.

rows.label: Stripe
rows.description: Sync revenue details from Stripe directly into your inbox or CRM.

rows.label: Salesforce
rows.description: Synchronize with your Salesforce account.

rows.label: HelpDesk
rows.description: Create HelpDesk tickets directly from chats.

rows.label: Freshdesk
rows.description: Capture support tickets and customer info via chats.

rows.label: Zendesk
rows.description: Automate tasks and create Zendesk tickets with a chatbot.

rows.label: Wix
rows.description: Add chatbot to your Wix website.

rows.label: Squarespace
rows.description: Connect your chatbot to Squarespace.

rows.label: Custom
rows.description: Create custom integrations with your tools and services.

rows.label: Webhooks
rows.description: Exchange data between your backend and chatbot to customize flows.

rows.label: Javascript API
rows.description: Control Chat Widget behavior on your website with JavaScript.

rows.label: REST API
rows.description: Manage chatbot data and actions through secure HTTP requests.

rows.label: Native Shopify actions
rows.description: Enables direct Shopify actions such as order lookups or refunds from within the chat interface.

rows.label: OpenAPI
rows.description: Provides an open API for developers to integrate, extend, or automate system functionality.

rows.label: Slack notifications
rows.description: Sends notifications to Slack based on new conversations or updates.

rows.label: API keys
rows.description: Allows generating API keys for connecting external systems or automations.

rows.label: Integrations
rows.description: Supports connecting external systems and services directly with the platform.

rows.label: App Builder
rows.description: Indicates availability of tools for building custom apps within the platform.

rows.label: Prebuilt apps & integrations
rows.description: Provides access to prebuilt apps and integrations that extend platform functionality.

rows.label: Custom objects
rows.description: Indicates whether the platform supports creating and managing custom data objects.

rows.label: External knowledge storage
rows.description: Indicates availability of storing knowledge content in external systems.

rows.label: Private custom apps & integrations
rows.description: Indicates whether private, custom-built apps and integrations are supported within the plan.

rows.label: API access
rows.description: Provides access to the platform's API for building integrations and automations.

rows.label: Additional API volume (10+ agents required)
rows.description: Indicates the availability of additional API request volume for larger teams.

rows.label: Messaging platform (3rd party chatbots)
rows.description: Allows connecting third-party chatbots to the messaging platform.

rows.label: Access to conversation tools and APIs
rows.description: Provides access to conversation-related tools and APIs.

rows.label: Basic Platform Support
rows.description: Includes basic support for the platform.

rows.label: Channels
rows.description: Provides access to supported messaging and communication channels.

rows.label: Orchestration APIs (Switchboard)
rows.description: Enables orchestration APIs for coordinating bots, agents, and automated workflows.

rows.label: Mobile SDK
rows.description: Provides mobile SDKs for integrating chat and messaging features into iOS and Android applications.

rows.label: AWS events connector
rows.description: Connector to ingest events from AWS services (often an add-on).

rows.label: Chat SDKs
rows.description: Embed the chat widget and implement the behaviors you need to engage customers.

rows.label: Live Typing preview
rows.description: See what users are typing before they hit send.

rows.label: Typing Status Indicator
rows.description: See when a user or agent is typing in real time.

rows.label: Widget Customization
rows.description: Customize colors, text, and position to match your brand.

rows.label: Proactive Chat Messages
rows.description: Trigger chat conversations automatically based on user behavior.

rows.label: Magic Browse
rows.description: Start a co-browsing session with website visitors and share your screen if needed.

rows.label: Live Translate
rows.description: Translate messages instantly in multiple languages.

rows.label: Video & Audio chat
rows.description: Engage with leads or customers through live audio or video.

rows.label: Help Widget
rows.description: Add a self-service help widget to your site for instant answers.

rows.label: White Label
rows.description: Remove vendor branding from the widget.

rows.label: Chat Window Docking
rows.description: Users can dock the chat window while browsing; notifications show on new messages.

rows.label: Max Queue Auto-hide/Auto-offline
rows.description: Hide or switch widget offline automatically when queue length exceeds a limit.

rows.label: Multilingual Chat Widget
rows.description: Offer the chat widget in 40+ languages; configure per-widget language options.

rows.label: Version History
rows.description: Access ten last versions of your chatbots and restore previous ones if needed.

rows.label: LiveChat
rows.description: Connect LiveChat to combine AI efficiency with human support.

rows.label: Basic widget customization
rows.description: Allows making basic visual and functional customizations to the chat widget.

rows.label: Web widget
rows.description: Provides an embeddable website widget for live chat and/or messaging.

rows.label: Pre-chat form
rows.description: Collects details from visitors before the conversation starts (e.g., email, topic, order ID).

rows.label: Unlimited concurrent chats
rows.description: Allows agents to handle an unlimited number of concurrent chats (subject to plan limits/policies).

rows.label: Shortcuts
rows.description: Keyboard shortcuts and quick actions to speed up handling conversations.

rows.label: Automatic translation
rows.description: Automatically translates messages to support multilingual conversations.

rows.label: Send & receive files
rows.description: Enables file sharing between agents and customers in the widget.

rows.label: Conversation rating
rows.description: Collects customer feedback ratings after conversations.

rows.label: Rich message types
rows.description: Supports richer message formats (e.g., buttons, cards, quick replies) in messaging.

rows.label: Conversation history
rows.description: Stores conversation history so agents can view context and past interactions.

rows.label: Re-engagement
rows.description: Lets you re-engage customers and continue conversations over time.

rows.label: Whisper mode
rows.description: Allows internal agent-only messages during live handling to coordinate without the customer seeing.

rows.label: Warm transfer
rows.description: Transfers conversations between agents/teams with context preserved.

rows.label: Send proactive messages
rows.description: Enables proactive outreach messages to visitors/customers based on rules or triggers.

rows.label: Widget unbranding
rows.description: Removes platform branding from the widget (often enterprise-only or plan-dependent).

rows.label: Live chat button
rows.description: Show a live chat button on the website to start a conversation.

rows.label: Proactive chat invitations
rows.description: Automatically invite visitors to chat based on rules (time on page, exit intent, etc.).

rows.label: Chat transcripts
rows.description: Store and export chat transcripts for review and history.

rows.label: Mobile chat window
rows.description: Mobile-optimized chat widget experience.

rows.label: Chat welcome message setting
rows.description: Configure automated welcome messages shown when a visitor opens the widget.

rows.label: Contact forms – In page
rows.description: Embed contact forms directly into a page (not only as a button/widget).

rows.label: Contact form widgets customization
rows.description: Customize the look and behavior of contact form widgets.

rows.label: Chat widgets customization
rows.description: Customize chat widget design and behavior (colors, position, triggers, etc.).

rows.label: Sound configuration
rows.description: Configure notification sounds for agents and chat events.

rows.label: Call widgets customization
rows.description: Customize call widget appearance and behavior (if voice widget is available).

rows.label: Video call widgets customization
rows.description: Customize the video call widget appearance and behavior.

rows.label: Contact forms – Contact us buttons
rows.description: Allows adding "Contact us" buttons that open a contact form or start a conversation. The value represents the number of contact form buttons included in the plan.

rows.label: File sharing over chat
rows.description: Allows agents and customers to send and receive files directly within chat conversations.

rows.label: AI Knowledge Training
rows.description: Ingest your internal data to train a custom AI knowledge base or model.

rows.label: Internal AI Copilot
rows.description: Let support agents ask questions to an internal AI chat trained on your data.

rows.label: Voice-to-text
rows.description: Get immediate transcription for audio messages or recorded calls.

rows.label: Multilingual AI
rows.description: Use AI to answer customer questions in multiple languages.

rows.label: AI Writing Assistant
rows.description: Provide AI-powered writing tools for your teams.

rows.label: AI-Powered Site Search
rows.description: Help users find answers with AI-powered search before contacting support.

rows.label: AI Inbox Spam Filter
rows.description: Use an AI-powered spam filter that adapts to your settings.

rows.label: MCP Server
rows.description: Dedicated AI infrastructure for high performance and privacy.

rows.label: Auto-tagging Of Conversations
rows.description: Automatically classify conversations using AI.

rows.label: Conversation Summary
rows.description: Generate a concise summary of any conversation when needed.

rows.label: AI Agent
rows.description: Deploy an autonomous AI agent to handle customer conversations end to end.

rows.label: AI Conversations Quota
rows.description: Monthly AI bot conversations included (if applicable).

rows.label: Training History
rows.description: Review & answer untrained questions to optimize your chatbot.

rows.label: Automatic Bot Building
rows.description: Get a fully functional chatbot based on your existing business data.

rows.label: AI Assist
rows.description: Use AI to instantly and accurately answer customer questions.

rows.label: AI Model Training
rows.description: Review and fine-tune answers generated by AI.

rows.label: Multilingual AIb
rows.description: Use AI to answer customer questions in any language.

rows.label: Copilot: Generative AI tools for knowledge
rows.description: Indicates the availability level of generative AI tools for creating and managing knowledge content.

rows.label: Copilot: Generative AI tools for agents
rows.description: Indicates availability of AI-powered tools that assist agents with generative responses and guidance.

rows.label: Copilot: Intelligent triage
rows.description: Uses AI to categorize and prioritize incoming requests automatically.

rows.label: Copilot: Actionable insights and suggestions
rows.description: Provides AI-driven insights and suggestions to improve support efficiency.

rows.label: Copilot: Macro insights for admins
rows.description: Delivers AI-based analysis of macro performance to help optimize workflows.

rows.label: Copilot: Reporting and insights
rows.description: Provides AI-powered reporting enhancements and actionable insights.

rows.label: Monthly Active Users per month
rows.description: Indicates the number of monthly active users included in the plan.

rows.label: Notifications per month
rows.description: Specifies the number of notifications allowed per month under the plan.

rows.label: Guidance
rows.description: Provides contextual guidance or recommendations to agents during their work.

rows.label: Product recommendation
rows.description: Provides automated or assisted product recommendations during customer interactions.

rows.label: Lyro Connect
rows.description: Indicates availability or requirements for connecting Lyro with other systems or data sources.

rows.label: Lyro custom name
rows.description: Allows assigning a custom display name to the Lyro AI agent.

rows.label: Advanced Copilot
rows.description: Provides advanced AI copilot capabilities for enhanced assistance and automation.

rows.label: AI reply assistant
rows.description: Assists agents by generating AI-powered reply suggestions during conversations.

rows.label: AI agents for email
rows.description: Enables AI agents to automatically handle and respond to customer emails.

rows.label: AI agents for messaging
rows.description: Enable AI agents for messaging channels; may require messaging to be enabled.

rows.label: Generative replies
rows.description: Uses AI to generate suggested replies for agents during conversations.

rows.label: AI agent persona
rows.description: Allows defining a custom persona that controls how the AI agent communicates and behaves.

rows.label: Instructions
rows.description: Enables providing instructions that guide how AI agents should respond and act.

rows.label: Escalations and data capture
rows.description: Allows AI agents to escalate conversations and capture structured data when needed.

rows.label: AI agent builder
rows.description: Access to tools for building and configuring AI agents (may require an add-on depending on plan).

rows.label: Integrations & actions
rows.description: Enables the AI to trigger integrations or perform actions (may require an add-on depending on plan).

rows.label: Reasoning controls
rows.description: Provides controls over AI behavior and decision-making (may require an add-on depending on plan).

rows.label: Included automated resolutions
rows.description: The number of automated resolutions included in the plan per agent and per month.

rows.label: Committed automated resolutions
rows.description: Discounted unit price for automated resolutions when purchased as a committed volume.

rows.label: Pay-as-you-go automated resolutions
rows.description: Unit price for automated resolutions billed on a pay-as-you-go basis.

rows.label: Essential AI agent reporting
rows.description: Basic reporting for essential AI agent performance and usage.

rows.label: Advanced AI agent reporting
rows.description: Advanced reporting and insights for AI agents (may require an add-on depending on plan).

rows.label: Essential language support
rows.description: Baseline language support for AI and/or agent workflows.

rows.label: Advanced language support
rows.description: Enhanced language support for AI and/or messaging (may require an add-on depending on plan).

rows.label: AI Answer Assistant
rows.description: AI assistant that suggests answers or helps agents respond faster.

rows.label: AI Chatbot
rows.description: AI chatbot that can handle customer questions and automate support conversations.

rows.label: Custom Attributes
rows.description: Add and manage custom attributes to enrich customer profiles.

rows.label: Customer Profile
rows.description: Store and manage detailed information about each customer.

rows.label: Customer Segmentation
rows.description: Group users based on behavior, attributes, or custom tags.

rows.label: Smart Filters
rows.description: Search messages, articles, contacts, or plugins using advanced filters.

rows.label: Customer-based Notes
rows.description: Leave internal notes on customer profiles for better collaboration.

rows.label: Customer Lifecycle Tracking
rows.description: Track and analyze the journey from lead to loyal customer.

rows.label: Customer Timeline Activity
rows.description: View a chronological history of interactions and events per customer.

rows.label: Entities
rows.description: Validate user data to personalize chat flows.

rows.label: User profiles and aliases
rows.description: Indicates the availability and capabilities of user profiles and alias management within the plan.

rows.label: Essentials card
rows.description: Displays key customer or ticket information in a compact summary card.

rows.label: Interaction history
rows.description: Provides a full history of past interactions with a customer.

rows.label: Group contacts by organization
rows.description: Indicates how contacts can be grouped or organized by company or organization within the system.

rows.label: Custom user and organization fields
rows.description: Allows adding custom fields to user and organization profiles.

rows.label: Light agents
rows.description: Indicates the availability or limits of light agent roles within the plan.

rows.label: Light agents add-on
rows.description: Specifies whether additional light agents can be added as an add-on.

rows.label: Departments
rows.description: Number of departments supported within the workspace, such as 2 or Unlimited.

rows.label: No-code AI Chatbot Builder
rows.description: Build advanced automation flows across connected channels.

rows.label: AI-generated Answers
rows.description: Provide instant, AI-powered answers to common queries.

rows.label: Scenario Drafts
rows.description: Design and test chatbot scenarios before going live.

rows.label: Custom Input Fields
rows.description: Collect structured data from users directly in chat.

rows.label: Conditional Flows
rows.description: Create workflows that adapt based on user responses or attributes.

rows.label: Keyword-based Triggers
rows.description: Trigger automated actions when certain keywords are detected.

rows.label: Automation via APIs
rows.description: Integrate external services and trigger workflows through APIs.

rows.label: Webhook Actions
rows.description: Push data to external systems in real time as events occur in the platform.

rows.label: CRM-based Triggers
rows.description: Automate actions based on CRM data or events.

rows.label: Iframes
rows.description: Embed external content or tools directly within the chat.

rows.label: Unlimited AI Chatbot Templates
rows.description: Create as many chatbot templates as your workflows require.

rows.label: AI-based Triggers
rows.description: Automatically detect user intent using AI.

rows.label: AI-agent Blocks
rows.description: Use AI-powered building blocks to create smarter multi-channel flows.

rows.label: Automation Quota (visitors/month)
rows.description: Monthly limit of unique visitors reached by automations/flows.

rows.label: A/B Testing
rows.description: Distribute traffic between variants of chatbot flows to compare performance.

rows.label: Advanced Button Actions
rows.description: Run actions (e.g., set attributes, add/remove segments) when users click buttons.

rows.label: Debug Mode
rows.description: Inspect and trace conversation flow execution (JSON view) for troubleshooting.

rows.label: Templates Library
rows.description: Prebuilt templates for common use cases to jump-start new bots.

rows.label: Ring-to-all Routing
rows.description: Notify all agents until one accepts.

rows.label: Priority Routing
rows.description: Route by agent priority / time since last chat.

rows.label: Utilization-based Routing
rows.description: Route to lowest/highest utilization to balance workload.

rows.label: Random Routing
rows.description: Assign chats randomly among available agents.

rows.label: Visual Builder
rows.description: Preview and modify your chatbot using a simple drag-and-drop builder.

rows.label: Templates
rows.description: Use chatbot templates designed for specific business cases.

rows.label: Flows
rows.description: Organize your chatbot into subflows for a better editing experience.

rows.label: Embedded Apps
rows.description: Embed apps in the chat window.

rows.label: Visitors Reached via Flows
rows.description: Defines how many unique visitors can be automatically engaged or messaged through chatbot Flows each month.

rows.label: Sales Flows Templates
rows.description: Offers ready-to-use chatbot flow templates focused on driving sales and improving conversion rates.

rows.label: FAQ Flows Templates
rows.description: Provides predefined chatbot flow templates for automatically answering common customer questions.

rows.label: Visual Flows Builder
rows.description: Lets users design chatbot automation flows through an intuitive visual drag-and-drop interface.

rows.label: Operating hours
rows.description: Allows setting business hours to control agent or chatbot availability.

rows.label: Automatic response
rows.description: Sends predefined or AI-generated replies automatically based on visitor messages or conditions.

rows.label: Automatic chat assignment
rows.description: Automatically assigns new chats to available agents based on defined rules or workload.

rows.label: Automated satisfaction survey
rows.description: Automatically sends post-chat surveys to collect customer satisfaction feedback.

rows.label: Automated conversation solving
rows.description: Automatically marks or resolves conversations when certain criteria are met, such as inactivity or completed responses.

rows.label: Macros
rows.description: Lets agents create reusable message or action shortcuts to automate repetitive tasks.

rows.label: Flows building and strategy assistance
rows.description: Provides guidance and support in designing conversation flows and overall chatbot strategy.

rows.label: Ticket mass actions
rows.description: Performs bulk updates or changes across multiple tickets at once.

rows.label: To Solve Algorithm
rows.description: Automatically prioritizes or routes tickets to speed up resolution.

rows.label: Custom tags
rows.description: Enables adding custom tags to categorize and organize tickets.

rows.label: Custom ticket filters
rows.description: Allows creating custom ticket filters. Limits vary by plan (e.g., filters per agent).

rows.label: Ticket transfers
rows.description: Allows transferring tickets between agents or departments.

rows.label: Business hours
rows.description: Allows setting working hours to control agent and automation availability.

rows.label: Roles in departments
rows.description: Allows assigning different roles or permissions within individual departments.

rows.label: Canned messages
rows.description: Number of saved predefined reply messages available to agents.

rows.label: Predefined answers
rows.description: Number of predefined answer templates available to agents.

rows.label: Time Tracking
rows.description: Tracks time spent on tickets or conversations. May require an add-on depending on the plan.

rows.label: Rules & Time rules
rows.description: Enables automation rules triggered by conditions or time-based actions.

rows.label: Gamification
rows.description: Adds gamification elements such as badges or performance points for agents.

rows.label: Search & replace
rows.description: Allows searching and replacing text across tickets or conversations.

rows.label: Event Rules
rows.description: Number of automation rules that can be triggered by specific events.

rows.label: Time Rules
rows.description: Number of time-based automation rules available under this plan.

rows.label: SLA rules
rows.description: Availability and number of SLA-based workflow rules supported in the plan.

rows.label: SLA levels
rows.description: Number of SLA priority levels that can be configured.

rows.label: Skills-based routing
rows.description: Routes conversations to agents based on their skills or expertise.

rows.label: Approvals
rows.description: Enables approval flows for requests or actions within the system.

rows.label: Triggers
rows.description: Allows creating automated triggers that perform actions based on ticket conditions.

rows.label: Ticket sharing between multiple accounts
rows.description: Enables sharing tickets across multiple accounts through defined workflows.

rows.label: Conversation routing
rows.description: Routes conversations to the appropriate agent based on availability, capacity, skills, and priority.

rows.label: Multiple ticket forms
rows.description: Allows creating and using multiple ticket form layouts for different request types.

rows.label: Conditional ticket fields
rows.description: Displays ticket fields dynamically based on conditions such as selections or ticket state.

rows.label: Service level agreements (SLA)
rows.description: Enables defining response and resolution time targets based on SLA policies.

rows.label: Guided mode
rows.description: Directs agents through tickets sequentially to ensure efficient handling and workflow discipline.

rows.label: Pre-defined responses (macros)
rows.description: Provides reusable pre-defined responses to speed up agent workflow.

rows.label: Custom business rules (triggers & automations)
rows.description: Allows creating automated rules that control ticket actions and workflow.

rows.label: Version management
rows.description: Enables managing and maintaining versions of configurations or settings.

rows.label: Ticketing automations
rows.description: Automates ticket workflows using predefined rules and actions.

rows.label: Actions
rows.description: Allows performing predefined actions or operations as part of workflows or automation.

rows.label: Moments
rows.description: Event-based actions triggered by specific user behaviors.

rows.label: Articles & Categories
rows.description: Write, manage, and edit a dedicated help center that integrates with your support tools.

rows.label: Customization
rows.description: Adapt colors, text, and layout of your help center to fit your brand.

rows.label: Multilingual Help Center
rows.description: Offer your help center in multiple languages for a global audience.

rows.label: Help Center SDK
rows.description: Integrate your help center anywhere using an SDK.

rows.label: Search
rows.description: Search messages, articles, contacts, or plugins using advanced filters.

rows.label: Article Feedback

rows.label: Custom Domain Name

rows.label: Interactions Popularity

rows.label: Structured content
rows.description: Specifies the supported depth of structured content, such as up to 2 levels.

rows.label: Search
rows.description: Specifies the search capability limits or indexing depth available in the plan.
